statements: SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock > 50;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE reorder_threshold < current_stock;
SELECT product_name, reorder_quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY reorder_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_threshold ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE reorder_quantity > 0 AND current_stock < reorder_threshold;
SELECT inventory_id, product_name, reorder_quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY reorder_quantity ASC, product_name LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE current_stock > 50 OR reorder_threshold < 20;
SELECT product_name, current_stock AS available_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock > reorder_threshold * 2;
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM products ORDER BY inventory_level DESC
SELECT product_name, reorder_threshold FROM products ORDER BY reorder_threshold ASC
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders
SELECT order_id, quantity, order_date FROM purchase_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE inventory_level < 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, inventory_level FROM products WHERE inventory_level > 50 ORDER BY inventory_level DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, order_date FROM products INNER JOIN purchase_orders ON products.product_id = purchase_orders.product_id WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;

SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products JOIN purchase_orders ON products.product_id = purchase_orders.product_id GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 500 ORDER BY total_quantity ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM products;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT id, item_name FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM purchase_orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT trigger_name, action_description FROM inventory_triggers
SELECT * FROM inventory_items ORDER BY quantity DESC, item_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity < reorder_threshold
SELECT * FROM inventory_triggers WHERE trigger_condition = 'low_quantity'
SELECT order_id, item_name, order_quantity, order_date FROM purchase_orders JOIN inventory_items ON purchase_orders.item_id = inventory_items.id
SELECT trigger_id, trigger_name, action_description FROM inventory_triggers WHERE trigger_name LIKE '%delay%'
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, current_quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY current_quantity DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT product_name, current_quantity, reordering_threshold FROM inventory WHERE current_quantity < reordering_threshold;
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(quantity) as total_quantity FROM purchase_orders GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, current_quantity FROM inventory WHERE current_quantity < 10;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM purchase_orders GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT product_name, current_quantity, CASE WHEN current_quantity < reordering_threshold THEN 'Low stock' ELSE 'Sufficient stock' END AS stock_status FROM inventory;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM products ORDER BY inventory_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders WHERE status='pending';
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT product_id, action, action_date FROM inventory_logs WHERE action_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM products;
SELECT order_id, order_quantity, order_date, status FROM purchase_orders WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id > 3 ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM products WHERE inventory_level < reorder_threshold ORDER BY inventory_level ASC;
SELECT notification_type, message, notification_date FROM notifications WHERE notification_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
